subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Is a final four of Novak Djokovic, Andy Murray, Tomas Berdych and David Ferrer indicative of the A.T.P.’s depth, or a sign that the Big Three’s stranglehold has weakened?
snippet: Is a final four of Novak Djokovic, Andy Murray, Tomas Berdych and David Ferrer indicative of the A.T.P.’s depth, or a sign that the Big Three’s stranglehold has weakened?
